report.title: My Plot Groups in Project 2
report.description: List plot groups in project for a user. This version of report does not use cache tables as that causes a delay to display.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM termlists_terms tt JOIN terms t on t.id = tt.term_id and t.deleted=false JOIN termlists_term_attribute_values ttav on ttav.termlists_term_id = tt.id AND ttav.int_value = #group_id# AND ttav.termlists_term_attribute_id = #plot_group_project_termlists_term_attr_id# AND ttav.deleted=false JOIN person_attribute_values pav on pav.int_value = tt.id AND pav.person_attribute_id = #plot_group_person_attr_id# AND pav.deleted=false JOIN users u on u.person_id = pav.person_id AND u.id = #user_id# AND u.deleted = false WHERE tt.termlist_id = #plot_groups_termlist_id#

param.name: plot_group_project_termlists_term_attr_id
param.display: Plot group termlists term attr id
param.description: The id of the termlists term attribute that holds the project for a plot group.

param.name: plot_group_person_attr_id
param.description: The id of the person attribute that holds the plot groups for a person.

param.name: group_id
param.description: Recording group ID of current project.

param.name: user_id
param.description: Indicia User ID for current user.
